name.baseName: Biomass Aviation Fuel Gasification Fischer-Tropsch Synthesis;Distillation Upgrading Route
生物质航空燃油气化费托合成;分馏提质路线

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: After pre-treatment operations such as grinding and drying, the biomass enters the gasifier for reaction, and the gasification agent is introduced. The gasification reactor is a circulating fluidized bed furnace. After cooling, the reaction products are separated from exhaust gas and solid impurities, and the synthesized gas obtained is purified and adjusted (mainly for water gas shift reaction) to achieve the optimal hydrogen carbon ratio (H2/CO=2) required for the Fischer Tropsch synthesis reaction. Under the action of a cobalt based catalyst, a Fischer-Tropsch synthesis reaction occurs, separating the reaction products into gas, liquid, and solid phases. The low-carbon components (C1-C4) in the gas phase enter the stacking oligomerization unit for stacking alkylation reaction and olefin polymerization reaction, generating C5+hydrocarbon components and sending them to the hydrogenation isomerization unit to produce the liquid phase alkane components. The unreacted low-carbon hydrocarbons are separated from methane and collected together with methane generated in other stages of the process, The collected methane and carbon dioxide generated during the purification and transformation process enter the methane carbon dioxide reforming unit for hydrogen production reaction, and the generated hydrogen enters the upgrading unit for hydrogenation isomerization and hydrocracking reaction. H2 and CO reflux to the Fischer Tropsch synthesis reactor for cyclic reaction. The liquid phase components of C5-C16 are mixed with C5-C16 liquid alkanes generated by hydrocracking of C16+heavy components after hydroisomerization, and then separated by distillation. The C8-C16 product is output as an aviation oil component, and the C5-C7 product is output as a gasoline component; The C16+heavy component undergoes hydrocracking reaction with hydrogen gas under high temperature environment, producing C5-C16 liquid alkane component, C3-C4 liquefied petroleum gas component (LPG), and unreacted wax phase products. Each link of the quality improvement unit will generate some combustible gases (low-carbon hydrocarbons, H2, CO, etc.), and the separated H2 and CO will enter the Fischer-Tropsch synthesis reactor for re reaction. Some methane will enter the reforming unit for hydrogen production, and the remaining combustible gas will enter the boiler for combustion. The heat released will be partially supplied to the logistics entering the reactor for heating, and some will enter the energy recovery unit for heating water to generate steam for power generation.

生物质经研磨干燥等预处理操作后进入气化器进行反应，通入气化剂，气化反应器为循环流化床炉。反应产物经过冷却后分离出废气和固体杂质，得到的合成气经净化调变后（主要是水煤气变换反应）达到费托合成反应所需的最优氢碳比（H2/CO=2）。在钴基催化剂的作用下发生费托合成反应，将反应产物按气、液、固三相进行分离。气相的低碳组分（C1-C4）进入叠合齐聚单元发生叠合烷基化反应和烯烃聚合反应，生成 C5+ 烃类组分送入加氢异构单元生产液相的烷烃组分，未反应的低碳烃类分离出甲烷，并和工艺中其它阶段生成的甲烷进行统一收集，收集的甲烷和净化调变过程中产生的二氧化碳一起进入甲烷二氧化碳重整单元进行制氢反应，生成的氢气进入提质单元供给加氢异构和加氢裂化反应，H2 和 CO 回流至费托合成反应器进行循环反应。C5-C16 的液相组分 经过加氢异构后和 C16+重质组分加氢裂化后生成的 C5-C16 液体烷烃混合，再通过精馏分离，C8-C16 产物作为航油组分输出，C5-C7 产物作为汽油组分输出；C16+重质组分在高温 环境下同氢气发生加氢裂化反应，产生 C5-C16 液体烷烃组分、C3-C4 液化石油气组分（LPG）和未反应的蜡相产物。提质单元的各环节均会产生部分可燃气体（低碳烃、H2、CO 等），分离出其中的 H2 和 CO 进入费托合成反应器进行再反应，部分甲烷进入重整单元制氢，剩余可燃气体进入锅炉燃烧，放出的热量部分供给进入反应器的物流进行加热，部分进入能量回收单元加热水产生水蒸气进行发电。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This biomass-based aviation fuel production process, involving gasification and Fischer-Tropsch synthesis followed by distillation upgrading, is used for converting corn straw, an agricultural waste byproduct of corn cultivation, into high-value aviation fuel and gasoline components. It employs a circular fluidized bed furnace for the gasification of biomass and cobalt-based catalysts for the Fischer-Tropsch reaction, to produce liquid fuels suitable for use as aviation fuel and gasoline after further treatment and separation. Excess gases produced in the process are used for energy recovery and power generation.
该生物质航空燃料生产过程通过气化、费托合成以及后续的分馏提质，将玉米秸秆（玉米种植的农业废弃副产品）转化为高价值的航空燃料和汽油组分。该过程使用循环流化床炉用于生物质的气化和钴基催化剂用于费托合成反应，以产生适合作为航空燃料和汽油使用的液体燃料。过程中产生的多余气体被用于能量回收和发电。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: Build a simulation model of the complete process using Aspen Plus software and perform simulation calculations to obtain the mass flow, energy flow, thermodynamic parameters, and reactor power consumption of each process based on mass balance
运用 Aspen Plus 软件搭建工艺完整流程的仿真模型并进行模拟计算，在质量平衡的基础上获得各项工艺的质量流、能量流、热力学参数和反应器的功耗

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The corn straw selected in this article is agricultural waste generated during the corn planting process. Therefore, the environmental impact caused by resource investment and pollutant emissions during the planting process needs to be allocated in a certain way. In this article, economic coefficients are used for allocation calculation
本文选用的玉米秸秆是玉米种植过程中产生的农业废弃物，因此种植过程中资源投入和污染物排放造成的环境影响需通过一定方式进行分配，本文中采用经济系数进行分配计算

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 邓玥. 纤维素类生物质气化催化合成制备航空燃油系统的综合评价. (东南大学, 2021).
邓玥. 纤维素类生物质气化催化合成制备航空燃油系统的综合评价. (东南大学, 2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for Life Cycle Assessment, ensure proper allocation of environmental impacts from the corn cultivation phase based on economic coefficients. The simulation model constructed with Aspen Plus software should be meticulously reviewed for accurate mass and energy balance assessments, accounting for thermodynamic parameters and power consumption. Care must be taken to accurately model the byproduct utilization, energy recovery and power generation stages for comprehensive LCA application. The results should be contextually matched with real-world processing conditions, considering potential variations in feedstock quality and process efficiency.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，要确保基于经济系数正确地分配来自玉米种植阶段的环境影响。使用Aspen Plus软件构建的仿真模型应该进行仔细的评审，准确评估质量平衡和能量平衡，考虑热力学参数和功耗。必须准确模拟副产品利用、能量回收和发电阶段，以便全面应用生命周期评估。结果应与实际加工条件相匹配，考虑原料质量和工艺效率的潜在变化。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The original article did not distinguish between bio and fossil, but experts judged that this is bio.
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为bio
The original article does not distinguish between bio and fossil, and experts judge that this is bio
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为bio
